# polaris_ncd_archival_location (Data Source)

The `polaris_ncd_archival_location` data source is used to access information about
a NAS Cloud Direct (NCD) archival location for a specific cluster. An archival location
is looked up using the cluster ID and archival location name.

Use this data source to get the archival location ID for use with `ncd_config` backup
location fields in an SLA domain resource.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `cluster_id` (String) Cluster ID (UUID).
- `name` (String) Name of the archival location.

### Read-Only

- `active` (Boolean) Whether the archival location is active.
- `cluster_name` (String) Name of the cluster.
- `cluster_status` (String) Status of the cluster.
- `cluster_version` (String) Version of the cluster.
- `id` (String) Archival location ID (UUID).
- `status` (String) Status of the archival location.
- `target_type` (String) Type of the archival target.
